title: Brains and Brawn: How AI is Really Taking Over High-Performance Computing (It's a Love Story, Not a Hostile Takeover!)
description: Forget Bonnie and Clyde, meet AI and HPC â€“ the real power duo revolutionizing almost everything. Picture this: AI, with its dazzling intellect, partnering with High-Performance Computing (HPC), a titan of processing power. It's not AI 'taking over' HPC; it's a symbiotic, super-powered partnership, a dance of algorithms and architectures.
author: Chuck Forsyth
